name: Host Metrics (EC2)
description: EC2 Instance with Installed Collector configured to send Host Metrics

children.name: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview dashboard provides at-a-glance information about a EC2 CPU, memory, network and disk usage.
children.title: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview

panels.title: Average CPU Idle per Instance Type

queries.queryString: _sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=CPU_Idle | avg by instanceType

panels.title: Overall Average CPU Load (1m, 5m, 15m)
panels.visualSettings: {"general":{"mode":"timeSeries"},"color":{"family":"scheme7"},"axes":{"axisY":{"title":"Average CPU Load"}},"overrides":[{"series":[],"queries":["A"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"1 Minute Average CPU Load"}},{"series":[],"queries":["B"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"5 Minute Average CPU Load"}},{"series":[],"queries":["C"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"15 Minute Average CPU Load"}}],"series":{}}

queries.queryString: _sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_1min | avg by metric

_sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_5min | avg by metric

_sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_15min | avg by metric

panels.title: Total Free System Memory per Instance Type

queries.queryString: _sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=Mem_Free | sum by instanceType

panels.title: Total Used, Less Buffers and Cached Memory per Instance Type

queries.queryString: _sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=Mem_ActualUsed | sum by instanceType

panels.title: Disk Used Bytes per Instance Type

queries.queryString: _sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=Disk_Used | sum by instanceType

panels.title: Disk Available Bytes per Instance Type

queries.queryString: _sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=Disk_Available | sum by instanceType

panels.title: Network InByte Rate per Instance Type

queries.queryString: _sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=Net_InBytes | sum by instanceType | rate

panels.title: Network OutByte Rate per Instance Type

queries.queryString: _sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=Net_OutBytes | sum by instanceType | rate

_sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=CPU_Sys | avg

_sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric= Mem_UsedPercent | avg

_sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric= TCP_InboundTotal | avg

_sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric= TCP_OutboundTotal | avg

_sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric= Net_InBytes | avg | eval _value/1024/1024

_sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric= Net_OutBytes | avg | eval _value/1024/1024

_sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=CPU_Sys | eval(_value/_value) | quantize to 60m using count | count by instancetype

_sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric=CPU_Sys | filter latest > 75 | sum by accountid, region, availabilityzone, instanceid, _sourcehost

_sourceCategory = *metrics _contentType=HostMetrics accountID={{Account}} region={{Region}} availabilityzone={{AvailabilityZone}} InstanceId={{InstanceId}} _sourceHost={{sourceHost}} metric= Mem_UsedPercent | filter latest > 75 | sum by account, region, availabilityzone, instanceid, _sourceHost
